articles.content: A Federal Government commitment of $76.8 million to underwrite Alcoa's giant Victorian aluminium smelter has been hailed as a lifeline for hundreds of workers, but as a lost opportunity to move towar… [+6687 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: USA begins massive vaccine rollout as crisis worsens | 9 News Australia - 9 News Australia
articles.description: The USA will begin rolling out the Pfizer coronavirus vaccine, as the nation's COVID-19 case count surpasses 16 million. Subscribe: https://bit.ly/2noaGhv Ge...
